name: Kaizen! Post-migration cleanup (Ship It! #60)
summary: In our 6th Kaizen, we talk with Jerod about all the things that we cleaned up after migrating changelog.com from a managed Kubernetes to Fly.io. We deleted the K8s cluster and moved wildcard cert management to Fastly &amp; all our vanity domain certs to Fly.io. We migrated the Docker Engine that our GitHub Actions is u...
